Articles.Content:
Hey there fellow Kerbalnauts. Stumbled upon this game in a thread on another froum; immediately fell in love. This game makes me feel like a fuckin\' kid again, in a really big way.

Anyway, hello, what\'s up, your add-ons are awesome.

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.

---Customer Testifications---

jgjiscool:'I can testify. Those things have crashed burned and definitely killed my brain.'
yay! I knew that inside-of-a-kerbokaur experience would get me noticed!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
